The screen has a super high brightness of up to 2000 nits, which can still be displayed most clearly in high-light environments, even under sunlight. Especially the Always On Display feature so that users can quickly view information on the screen without having to wake up the device.

name: Vivo V25 series
description: It seems that 2022 is a boom year for  V series phones when many products are launched with very impressive specifications and designs, including Vivo V25  just introduced in October 2022, promising to cause fever. in the technology market at the end of this year thanks to its beautiful shape and strong performance. Sophisticated design full of luxury Vivo V25 possesses very youthful and modern colors, not only bringing more choices to users but also giving a fresh and dynamic look when holding and using. A unique feature on this version is the ability to change colors from light to darker tones when exposed to high-light environments, this is definitely what makes every user able to admire right away. from the first contact. The machine uses a square design when the edges and two sides are delicately beveled, so it gives a flashy, trendy look. Helping you to be more confident in choosing to shop because this is still a very popular design in 2022. The back of Vivo V25 is made of high-grade glass material to both provide the ability to limit light scratches as well as make your device more fashionable. Supports high-quality selfies As for the camera, this Vivo V series phone is equipped with 3 lenses on the back. In which the main camera has a resolution of 64 MP, an ultra-wide-angle camera of 8 MP and a macro sensor with a resolution of 2 MP. Accompanied by quality lenses will be a series of high-end features that Vivo equips to help you unleash your photography in an artistic way, including outstanding features such as: Super Resolution , double exposure, night, background removal,... The feature that the company mentions a lot in the rear camera is the Bokeh Flare photography feature, which helps users be more active in customizing the level of background blur to give the photo more depth in a way that you desire. In addition, the device is also supported with OIS optical image stabilization and video standards that can be recorded up to 4K. An equally outstanding feature is the selfie camera with a resolution of up to 50 MP, which helps the device to focus more clearly and increase the detail of the photo. Users can now feel more confident in their selfies so that they can freely show off on social networking sites thanks to the quality photos that Vivo V25 delivers. Equipped with quality screen and advanced sound technology Vivo V25 is equipped with a 6.44-inch AMOLED panel to help reproduce images with more vibrant and deeper colors, along with a spacious operating space so you can play games or watch movies comfortably. . Enjoy the game with a high-performance chip Powering the device will be the Dimensity 900 5G chip from MediaTek, which not only meets everyday tasks well, but is also considered a processor that can handle many high-graphics games. current time (October 2022). In order to be more optimal in gaming, the company also equipped Vivo V25 with Game optimization mode to help users adjust the performance on the device to focus on the game to provide a smooth and stable game process. possible. As a phone with 8 GB RAM with the ability to expand by 8 GB from the internal memory, the device can fully multitask smoothly even when opening many applications at the same time. Long use time Integrated in the device will be a battery with a capacity of 4500 mAh with super-fast charging capacity of 44 W, helping your device to maintain all day use without worrying too much about running out of battery in the middle of the day. some. If you are a lover of Vivo phones with a beautiful design that comprehensively meets all basic needs from photography to high-graphics gaming, the Vivo V25 is probably a very worthwhile choice. consider and choose to buy. Thanks to being equipped with an affordable price and an impressive set of parameters, it promises to be a hot name in the mid-range segment.

name: Mobell F209
description: In addition to the technology race on smartphones, somewhere in the market there are still a few companies that continue to improve and produce popular phone models with the goal of meeting the needs of basic users. copy. Prominent among them can be mentioned the Mobell F209 with a large and clear screen, large battery and 4G VoLTE mobile network technology. Easy to pocket with slim body Mobell F209 owns a classic-looking appearance with rounded corners and edges, both the back and the frame are made of plastic, so the device feels relatively light with a weight of only 131.5 g. Preliminary in size, this Mobell phone is 57 mm wide and 122.7 mm long, so it can easily fit in the palm of your hand. Because the phone uses a removable battery design language, users can quickly remove and install the back cover, it becomes extremely convenient to replace such as SIM or battery without having to go to support centers. technical assistance. Instead of a camera cluster arrangement, the Mobell house gives us a set of speakers designed with a large size on the back, which both helps the device bring highlights and also brings better quality sound. Large and clear display The front of the phone will be a TFT LCD screen, the viewing angle is also quite wide so you can use the device in many different directions. In addition, the advantage of this type of panel is that it delivers relatively high-brightness content, suitable for situations where viewing messages or phone numbers when in high-brightness environments. See also: What is TFT LCD screen? What are the advantages? Which device uses TFT screen? Mobell F209 has a screen size of 2 inches, the display interface is intuitive and very easy to use, so it can be used by elderly parents or customers with poor eyesight. Besides, the machine supports displaying images with QVGA resolution (176 x 220 Pixels), enough to reproduce the sequence of numbers and text messages clearly. Listen to stable calls and comfortably store with 2000 numbers In order to provide more stable call quality, the company brings to the machine 4G VoLTE mobile network technology, which helps to receive better reception to limit network flickering and interruptions in suburban areas with signal. poor, thereby enhancing the experience every time you make calls. In this version, the device supports two card slots with Nano SIM format, in addition, the phone will also support storing contacts up to 2000 numbers for you to comfortably store. Comfortable talking for a long time Inside the device will be a battery with a capacity of 1500 mAh, this is considered a large number on a popular phone because the device mainly serves a few main tasks such as making calls and texting, so the power consumption is not so significant. So users can feel more secure when using the device for many days without worrying about running out of battery. If you are looking for a phone that can handle calls for many hours without worrying about battery, then Mobell F209 might be the right phone for you at the moment. helps you save a lot of money when you don't have to invest too much in a device just to use it to make calls.

Small appearance Itel it9010 4G has a finished plastic frame and back, removable battery design makes it easy to replace the battery every time it degrades without going to a repair service.

name: Masstel Lux 10 4G
description: Masstel Lux 10 - a phone model that has just been launched in Vietnam market in December 2022, the device is shaped by the manufacturer as a popular phone with the function to meet the main listening tasks. The phone features a large battery and advanced 4G VoLTE mobile network support. Slim and small design Masstel Lux 10 has a fairly modern appearance thanks to the use of a fairly square design language when the edges and back are beveled flat. The width of the phone is 53.8 mm, so it will easily fit in the palm of your hand.

name: Masstel IZI 10 4G
description: Masstel IZI 10 4G is another brick version of the  Masstel  house with integrated 4G providing a very good calling experience, with an easy-to-use user-friendly design, with support for memory card slots and good battery capacity, very selectable. User-friendly design, easy to use Masstel IZI 10 4G has the design of a common phone with a 262,000   1.77-inch color screen, 128 x 160 Pixels resolution for clear, beautiful images, easy-to-see interface, friendly and easy to use.

name: Mobell M239
description: Mobell officially launched the popular phone Mobell M239, which has the advantage of a neat design and youthful colors. Simple, sturdy design Mobell M239 possesses the familiar appearance of a popular phone, when using fine-tuned plastic material to help the device become youthful and extremely sturdy.

name: realme C53
description: realme C53 - a cheap phone with a beautiful design, large screen and sharp camera, is really a reasonable choice for users who are wondering to buy a device in the low-cost segment. Youthful square appearance realme C53 is designed with squareness and made mainly of plastic, providing a solid feeling when holding. With a compact waterdrop display, this realme phone can provide users with a wider screen experience while keeping its compact and stylish size.

name: Vivo Y36
description: Vivo Y36 is the latest Vivo Y phone launched by Vivo in Vietnam in June 2023. The device possesses a youthful modern appearance, a sharp display and stable performance for everyday tasks. Simple looks create charm Unlike previous Vivo Y phones, the front of the Y36 is replaced with a trendy mole design compared to the previous teardrop screen. It is this change that makes the screen wider and the edges are thinned for a good touch feeling.
